title: Anne-Marie Slaughter - Wikipedia
snippet: Anne-Marie Slaughter (born September 27, 1958) is an American lawyer and political scientist, and author. She is the current president and CEO of New America (formerly the New America Foundation). Previously, Slaughter served as the dean of Princeton School of Public and International Affairs ...

title: BIOGRAPHY: Anne-Marie Slaughter
snippet: Anne-Marie Slaughter is the President and CEO of New America and the Bert G. Kerstetter ’66 University Professor Emerita of Politics and International Affairs at Princeton University.

title: Anne-Marie Slaughter | President & CEO of New America
snippet: Anne-Marie Slaughter is currently the President and CEO of New America, a think tank and civic enterprise with offices in Washington and New York. She is also the Bert G. Kerstetter ‘66 University Professor Emerita of Politics and International ...

title: Anne-Marie Slaughter - Project Syndicate
snippet: Anne-Marie Slaughter, a former director of policy planning in the US State Department, is CEO of the think tank New America, Professor Emerita of Politics and International Affairs at Princeton University, and the author of Renewal: From Crisis ...

title: Anne-Marie Slaughter | World Leaders Forum
snippet: Anne-Marie Slaughter is currently the Bert G. Kerstetter '66 University Professor of Politics and International Affairs at Princeton University.
